welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Miami Springs! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture and beautiful tropical scenery that our city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Miami Springs has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and general aviation services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the FXE Airport WiFi network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for low-cost carriers such as Southwest Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada and Bahamasair.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and Spirit.

wifi.note: Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
